identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a CV builder that feels like a high-end architectural studio, not a tax form.
principles: Fusion: Swiss Precision x Organic Calm (Job hunting is stressful; the UI must be the antidote)
Content is King: The CV is the hero; the UI is the frame
Negative Space: Radical whitespace to reduce cognitive load

headings.usage: Main headlines, section titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em) for large text.

body.usage: UI elements, form inputs, long text.

mono.usage: Code snippets, AI confidence scores, technical details.

colors.strategy: Deep, trustworthy greens paired with electric lime for AI moments. Avoids the generic 'SaaS Blue'.

tailwind_vars.note: Update globals.css :root variables to match these HSL values

grid_system.app: Mode B: Control Room (Dense, functional, collapsible sidebars)

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 where others use p-4.
spacing.containers: Borders must have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Flat with subtle 1px border (slate-200). No heavy shadows unless hovering.

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary h-12

wizard.style: Step-based progress on left. Smooth 'AnimatePresence' transitions between steps.
wizard.step_indicator: Vertical line with active dots. Active step = Brand Color.

ai_features.badge: bg-secondary/30 text-secondary-foreground border border-secondary/50 text-xs font-mono uppercase tracking-wider
ai_features.suggestion_box: bg-gradient-to-br from-white to-slate-50 border border-indigo-100 shadow-sm p-4 rounded-lg relative overflow-hidden

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.gradients: No full-screen gradients. Use 'mesh' gradients only in small, contained areas (like AI buttons).
visual_enhancers.shadows: Layered shadows: shadow-sm + shadow-xl (low opacity) for depth.

motion.hover: Lift (-2px) and subtle scale (1.01) for cards.

hero_main.alt: Professional working in a clean, minimal space
hero_main.usage: Landing page hero section, right side or background with overlay.

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the new colors and font families.
critical_rules: DO NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings.
DO NOT use purple or teal for primary CTAs (Use the defined Deep Green).
Implement the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
